body: RT @HENTAIRULES: Excuse me, but so I’d most personally love to see the complete English Version of this one right here and now asap, please! Thank you so much! Amen!

@ potatoes
I dont think there is any english translation for that part yet.

Basically, the author was saying that he came up with a lot of ideas for the story,but not everything was used so he felt that it is wasteful. End up he put them all in the "another" part. 

The fruit is actually reverse of what is describe in the Bible, it actually remove all the unnecessary knowledge.
Author think that wearing the same clothes everyday is not interesting,so there are crate wash up shore for cosplaying (he like cosplay)
The rest ain't important
where is the english version of the "another" part of this
